channel.title: research on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in research on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.12: DMT, The Discovery of Dro"gen Hasen Weg and the Super Extreme Moon
item.description: 18th March, 2011 Hello everyone, I watched this video recently. http://www.esoterictube.com/dmt-the-spirit-molecule.html It corresponds with what Joseph Campbell says about the spiritual world (as represented by myths and anecdotes from those who meditate, and shamans), drugs and psychological diseases like schizophrenia.

item.title: LOG 1.4: Beauty and the Beasts
item.description: 30th December, 2010 Hello everyone, Another ‘Old Year’ has gone by … well I hope it was as happy as it could’ve been for everyone. So many things have happened, so many new things have been learnt!

item.title: LfE 18: Activities and work place
item.description: 07/02/2010 Hello ðŸ™‚ It snowed one morning unexpectedly. It is Feb so I thought all that weather is over. But it lasted an hour and melted within the next two days.
